thread.title: Sony’s new Web portal for Alpha camera users is filled with useful tips and tricks
thread.title_full: Sony’s new Web portal for Alpha camera users is filled with useful tips and tricks

title: Sony’s new Web portal for Alpha camera users is filled with useful tips and tricks
text: Sony’s new Web portal for Alpha camera users is filled with useful tips and tricks Saturday, 5 September 2015 (20 minutes ago) For both long-time users and newcomers, Sony has launched a new website dedicated to its Alpha-series cameras. Called Alpha Universe, the community-based site features tips and tricks, stories, profiles, events listings, and other related content.
